issue.title: adguardteam.github.io
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.samsung.com%2Fappquery%2FappDetail.as%3FappId%3Dcom.sec.android.app.sbrowser%26cId%3D000005006635](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadguardteam.github.io%2FAnonymousRedirect%2Fredirect.html%3Furl%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapps.samsung.com%252Fappquery%252FappDetail.as%253FappId%253Dcom.sec.android.app.sbrowser%2526cId%253D000005006635) ### Comment > I have a serious trouble using Adguard. First, ads didn’t be blocked at all. Only at a minority of app Adguard works, and for the common apps like Internet or Youtube Adguard doesn’t work at all. Second, some applications do not work while using Adguard. It makes me really uncomfortable. I need to stop operating Adguard and can use the other apps. > Actually, I already asked about my first problems before and you answered ‘adjust HTTPS filter.’ However, I already adjusted that filter. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/tlw6sjp4p3k8c880scgk4cg0g44kcw06djgvinogh0.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://dzen.ru/video?video_id=64d93300ae41ff4d8141fbd9](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdzen.ru%2Fvideo%3Fvideo_id%3D64d93300ae41ff4d8141fbd9) ### Comment Username: @Arsssem > На Дзен Видео останавливается, сначала (первые два-три затыка)звук идет при стопкадре, потом останавливается звук, следующие зависания уже синхронно со звуком. Так же зависания впроисходят при обратной перемотке просмотренного видео. При просмотре шортов так же некоторые видео останавливаются, при перезапуске проигрываются полностью. Подключение 300Мб оптика. Во всех браузерах одинаково. При отключении защиты зависаний нет. Поддержка Дзена причин не видит. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
It's related to this issue - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2449
As a temporary solution please add this rule:
```adblock
$popup,third-party,domain=aniwave.to,badfilter
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
Зависаний не наблюдаю, видео проигрываются нормально. На саму скорость по тарифу программа не влияет.
Возможно проблема в чем-то другом, но для начала попробуйте отключить все модули в программе, оставьте защиту включенной в программе, затем проверьте сайт.
Если будет все нормально, проверьте отдельно модули антибаннера, антитрекинга и днс.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.14

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://id.gov.ua/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. When AdGuard is enabled, you can't log in to https://id.gov.ua/ , you get error 900

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/735878/d83bc0f7-aeb3-4691-b733-65d4ea8b4c14)

</details>


### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

Please test this:

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/8361299/9c2c76cb-307a-4584-b250-15ab51e957bc)

add

`// @exclude https://*.gov.ua/*`

and save.

</details>

AdGuard Annoyances

comment.body: (somehow AdGuard extension for Safari even when disabled was influencing the process. I have turned off each parameter in Safari Extension settings, enabled it again and the issue was reproduced. Then I have enabled `Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion` in AdGuard for Safari and repeated with a few search queries. Also disabled the Annoyances filter there. In a few seconds the promotion ads appeared. Then enabled the annoyances filter and so far everything works.)

comment.body:
Ok, add `@@||api2.branch.io^` to `Safari protection` => `User rules` and wait a minute.
`DNS filtering` and `Safari protection` are different modules, operate independently.

comment.body:
Sorry, didn't mention that it's a proxied resource so you need a login to access. If you have any login for ProQuest (usually available through a public library), that should give more info, since it's not specific to just one database, it's everything on the proquest.com domain.

I was able to get it working by adding the user rule `@@||proquest.com/modules.gz/snowplow/$domain=proquest.com` which allows `snowplow-app.js` and `snowplow-utils.js` and `snowplow-init.js`. It looks like those were the issue under the AdGuard Tracking Protection filter.

Desktop

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jBEjQrhSGQ4](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DjBEjQrhSGQ4) ### Comment > al intentar reproducir un video en YouTube en el reproductor me aparece esto y no me deja cerrarlo u ocultarlo: > Los bloqueadores de anuncios infringen los Términos del Servicio de YouTube > Parece que utilizas un bloqueador de anuncios. Se bloquea la reproducción de vídeos, a menos que YouTube figure en la lista de permitidos o que se inhabilite el bloqueador de anuncios. > Gracias a los anuncios, millones de personas pueden disfrutar de YouTube en todo el mundo. > Para ver vídeos sin anuncios, pásate a YouTube Premium. Así, además, los creadores podrán recibir ingresos gracias a tu suscripción. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> We already have a rule:
> 
> ```
> consent.tyla.com,consent.gamingbible.com,consent.ladbible.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', '.message-component > button[title="Accept 🍪"]')
> ```
> 
> to close cookie notice automatically and it works fine on my end.

@AdamWr 
After more testing, I conclude that the cookie rule is not working for me.
If I disable the cookies filter, I can accept cookies manually, and the video plays.
Would a user rule to override the existing cookie rule be possible?
Otherwise I will have to disable the cookies filter alltogether.

comment.body:
@Alex-302 
I tried disabling the filters one by one. Ultimately, I disabled everything, including Userscripts and DNS filters.
Only the DNS server was handled through AdGuard. But the video player still refused to play. Or it took forever to load!
Finally, I reenabled everything, and configured the DNS server on the browser.
Now with the DNS server handled by the bowser, the video plays, though not immediately.
So at least now I have a configuration which works here.
Any disadvantages of having the DNS server handled by the browser instead of AdGuard?
